long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Get ready to step into the shoes of a real cop and experience the thrill of patrolling the city streets in "Police Car Cop Real Simulator" Take on the role of an elite law enforcement officer and uphold the law in this immersive and action-packed simulation game.

Features:

Realistic Police Cars: Choose from a variety of meticulously detailed police cars, each with its own unique attributes and handling. Feel the power of these vehicles as you race through the city in pursuit of criminals.

Diverse Missions: Dive into a wide range of challenging missions, from high-speed car chases to intense hostage rescues. Experience the daily life of a police officer as you respond to emergencies and maintain peace in the city.

Expansive City: Explore a sprawling open-world city filled with bustling traffic, pedestrians, and a dynamic day-night cycle. Patrol the streets, enforce traffic laws, and ensure the safety of the citizens.

Realistic Graphics: Immerse yourself in stunning, high-quality graphics and lifelike environments that make you feel like you're in the heart of the action. The attention to detail in the game world enhances the overall gaming experience.

Upgrades and Customization: Earn rewards and upgrade your police car with advanced equipment and weapons. Personalize your vehicle to suit your style and enhance your crime-fighting abilities.

High-Stakes Action: Engage in intense and heart-pounding pursuits as you chase down criminals, and use your tactical skills to outsmart them. Bring them to justice by any means necessary.

Police Tools: Utilize an array of authentic police tools, such as sirens, lights, spike strips, and more to aid you in your missions. Your toolkit is your lifeline in the fight against crime.

Realistic Physics: Experience realistic car physics and handling that make every chase and maneuver feel authentic. Whether you're drifting around corners or executing precision maneuvers, your skills will be put to the test.

Multiple Game Modes: Choose from various game modes, including Free Roam, Career, and Multiplayer, to tailor your gaming experience to your preferences.

Multiplayer Madness: Team up with friends or compete against players from around the world in intense multiplayer modes. Work together to solve crimes or engage in thrilling police pursuits.

Are you ready to be the hero the city needs? "Police Car Cop Real Simulator" offers an immersive and action-packed experience that lets you live the life of a police officer on the edge. Strap in, rev up your siren, and hit the streets to enforce the law and bring justice to the city!

HOW TO PLAY
You can move the character with the arrow keys, space and W-A-S-D keys.

HOW TO INSTALL
Click download this Extension using the "Add to Chrome" button.

Once the game has finished loading, simply select the "Extensions Icon" button. 

After clicking this, you'll be directed to the playground area, where the game "Police Car Cop Real Simulator" will launch automatically. All that's left is to press the play button and start enjoying the game.
